APPENDIX D
CALIFORNIA LEGISLATURE--1957 REGULAR SESSION
ASSEMBLY BILL No. 1535
Introduced by Messrs. Weinberger, Ernest R. Geddes, and Busterud
January 18, 1957
REFERRED TO COMMITTEE ON EDUCATION
An act to add Sections 9551 and 20255 to the Education Code,
relating to televised educational programs in the Public School
System.
The people of the State of California do enact as follows:
1 SECTION 1. Section 9551 is added to the Education Code,
2 to read:
3 9551. The governing board of any school district or the
4 county superintendent of schools acting in behalf of such a
5 board, or boards, may enter into contracts, either alone or in
6 cooperation with other school districts, for the purpose of
7 participating in or the procuring of television broadcasts for
8 use in the educational program of the schools. Nothing con-
9 tained in this section, however, shall be construed as author-
10 izing a school district or a county superintendent of schools
11 to own, lease, or operate a television broadcasting station.
12 SEC. 2. Section 20255 is added to said code, to read:
13 20255. The Director of Education, in behalf of any state
14 college, may enter into contracts, either alone or in coopera-
15 tion with local school districts or in cooperation with a
county superintendent of schools acting in behalf of school
